task: Add or remove ruled lines or gridlines
steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
To add ruled lines, go to the 'Layout' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Gridlines' button in the 'Page Setup' group.
Select the type of ruled lines you want to add.
To remove ruled lines, go to the 'Layout' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Gridlines' button in the 'Page Setup' group.
Deselect the type of ruled lines you want to remove.
To add gridlines, go to the 'Layout' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Gridlines' button in the 'Page Setup' group.
To remove gridlines, go to the 'Layout' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Gridlines' button in the 'Page Setup' group.
